name: Chonka: Become Obese
description:
Play as Chonka, a young cat trying to break into a raw cookie dough factory! he's gonna eat all their cookie dough n shieeeet. You have to fight enemies also looking for cookie dough. This game is a lot like Undertale, you can either eat the cookie dough, or you can abstain.

This game features :

  • Epic bullet hell
  • 2 main routes, and a bunch of bosses
  • Unlockable costumes & modes
  • Cookie dough
  • A ton of bonus content
  • QUASI-IRONIC HUMOR!

Compared to OG Chonka :

  • Actual save system
  • More settings and a bunch of QoL features
  • This includes being able to go to the main menu by holding ESC
  • Tons of level overhauls (including sparing WBM becoming easier)
  • Vastly improved costume system
  • Much, much more!
